015bf685-faab-42b9-bae7-e07a5a48ef8f.name: Combat Reflexes
015bf685-faab-42b9-bae7-e07a5a48ef8f.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

a40ec0e4-1723-408d-9498-82155bb1c3e6.name: Fit
a40ec0e4-1723-408d-9498-82155bb1c3e6.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

27e64e37-4bd6-4e35-8076-e26e9b52592c.name: Fit, Very
27e64e37-4bd6-4e35-8076-e26e9b52592c.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

45078969-5c5f-4bfb-9e90-d639c26d375a.name: High Pain Threshold
45078969-5c5f-4bfb-9e90-d639c26d375a.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

fa073c77-4ec8-4bfb-a8f6-76f81fe1a3dd.name: Luck, Extraordinary
fa073c77-4ec8-4bfb-a8f6-76f81fe1a3dd.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

6125ca90-df7a-4800-a121-0103aba8f876.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
6125ca90-df7a-4800-a121-0103aba8f876.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

471bd0a8-de65-4169-9e34-6c9576b8dbd6.name: Easy to Hit
471bd0a8-de65-4169-9e34-6c9576b8dbd6.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

df279a35-3d70-407f-bec5-cbffcbb56e3f.name: Signature Gear
df279a35-3d70-407f-bec5-cbffcbb56e3f.notes: For equipment normally bought with money, each point gives goods worth up to 50% of the average campaign starting wealth (but never cash).

74f9540c-9271-4daf-a103-4bca7110429f.name: Luck
74f9540c-9271-4daf-a103-4bca7110429f.notes: Usable once per hour of play

0aa90670-e3c4-4f66-b03a-f6c33f908ca8.name: Choose a total of -50 points in disadvantages that suit character image and background.
0aa90670-e3c4-4f66-b03a-f6c33f908ca8.notes: Here are a few categories to inspire you. Do not take the same trait twice and do not take opposing traits.

35604eb2-da76-42be-b96e-59005a3fb60d.name: Antisocial
35604eb2-da76-42be-b96e-59005a3fb60d.notes: Go light on these problems if you intend to specialize in social skills.

ea9f5ea5-e5e7-46cf-9540-ea91362a6270.name: Intolerance (@Class, Ethnicity, Nationality, Religion, Sex, or Species@)

81a76ba4-ed44-4ca6-98c9-57ea91d71b92.name: Clumsy
81a76ba4-ed44-4ca6-98c9-57ea91d71b92.notes: Go light on these problems if you plan to focus on physical skills – particularly combat skills.

7cca7732-a2ad-4856-ba52-93024983e32a.name: Delusion (@anything that overplays your expertise or “natural element"@)

403828f0-c106-4067-9ca3-293f6f1e2a59.name: Delusion (Guns are no match for fists!)

8d358ee7-3d60-4f9c-9fb9-be70bf271947.name: Delusion (Reality works just like the internet)

dc9f878a-afc9-45e3-a2bd-ef93e3c06df9.name: Obsession
dc9f878a-afc9-45e3-a2bd-ef93e3c06df9.notes: @Beat a specific rival or win a specific tournament@

40b8e079-e767-4da4-9d7b-c1b312e26bd7.name: Dimwitted
40b8e079-e767-4da4-9d7b-c1b312e26bd7.notes: Go light on these problems if you hope to play an intellectual with many technical skills

c4454e98-46cc-4a77-b5c9-b0a896a45c21.name: Intolerance (@Rival nation or other large group@)

1802ecf8-b6b4-4a02-a9ce-52c0cb4dffcb.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
1802ecf8-b6b4-4a02-a9ce-52c0cb4dffcb.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

d0fea798-56c8-405d-99b6-13d3c1ea5907.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
d0fea798-56c8-405d-99b6-13d3c1ea5907.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

633dda23-3e7d-418d-a4ae-2d8acbd871af.name: Obsession
633dda23-3e7d-418d-a4ae-2d8acbd871af.notes: @with a specifc computer hack, invention, research project, etc.@

2fb8616d-084b-4f2d-ab43-b2f06fd57b11.name: Trademark (@any design, methodology, or means of executing a technical task that’s uniquely yours@)

68a0efdf-6672-4b92-94d8-9d7338e516ef.name: Trademark (@any design, methodology, or means of executing a technical task that’s uniquely yours@)

f25ec61c-8bed-42f9-819e-bae94e5b3af0.name: Obsession
f25ec61c-8bed-42f9-819e-bae94e5b3af0.notes: @with bringing a criminal to justice, exacting revenge, solving a particular case, etc.@

4b415e3f-744f-4760-a2fc-317d2e56c977.name: Compulsive Behavior
4b415e3f-744f-4760-a2fc-317d2e56c977.notes: @a skilled activity such as hacking computers, modifying cars, or working out@

f14c44d0-8840-4b63-a81b-878d353a0248.name: Insomniac (Mild)
f14c44d0-8840-4b63-a81b-878d353a0248.notes: GM secretly rolls 3d for the number of days between episodes

46d31159-c8f2-4ee6-a8e4-b8a1d223e0b9.name: Insomniac (Severe)
46d31159-c8f2-4ee6-a8e4-b8a1d223e0b9.notes: GM secretly rolls 2d-1 for the number of days between episodes

d0aa264d-e64b-4c9e-a82d-3a60f3535ac4.name: Out of Shape
d0aa264d-e64b-4c9e-a82d-3a60f3535ac4.notes: Go light on these problems if you plan to focus on physical skills – particularly combat skills.

20043e58-2aa5-46d3-b521-de433e6effb8.name: Chummy
20043e58-2aa5-46d3-b521-de433e6effb8.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

90a9400e-8bfe-46f3-8892-d8ba02f52a0c.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
90a9400e-8bfe-46f3-8892-d8ba02f52a0c.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

cedcbc2c-a00a-49fb-a4c3-b3abd1a456d6.name: Insomniac (Mild)
cedcbc2c-a00a-49fb-a4c3-b3abd1a456d6.notes: GM secretly rolls 3d for the number of days between episodes

ab2a8333-cd25-4801-8def-54b586902f49.name: Insomniac (Severe)
ab2a8333-cd25-4801-8def-54b586902f49.notes: GM secretly rolls 2d-1 for the number of days between episodes

a3b1337c-fd7b-4f06-8999-a69ec21987ff.name: Socially Awkward
a3b1337c-fd7b-4f06-8999-a69ec21987ff.notes: Go light on these problems if you intend to specialize in social skills.

1cbe10b1-3bb8-4d6d-8a15-dbc50cecbce2.name: Vow (Refuse no request for medical aid)

a44911ae-7d3a-4ae6-bbde-c4a2599c7125.name: Judo
a44911ae-7d3a-4ae6-bbde-c4a2599c7125.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.
